description:
In 1982, attorneys Charles M. Merkel Jr. and John Hartwell Cocke established our Clarksdale law firm, Merkel & Cocke, P.A. Today, nearly 35 years later, we have a reputation as a leading law firm dedicated to protecting the rights of clients from throughout Northern Mississippi and the Memphis metropolitan area as they face legal challenges related to the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Product and premises liability
  • Medical and legal malpractice
  • Civil rights
  • Contract disputes
  • Casino litigation
  • Workers' compensation

Our law firm, which began as a partnership, has expanded to include four additional attorneys and a full support staff. All of our attorneys have received recognition from both their peers and their clients for their dedication to justice.

Whether your legal need stems from a personal injury suffered due to another's negligence or a workplace accident, a medical malpractice, a violation of your civil rights, a dispute involving a casino or contract, the experienced attorneys at the law firm of Merkel & Cocke, P.A., have the experience to help you overcome your challenge and reach your goals. If you would like to learn more about the services our firm offers, you can take advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation at our Clarksdale law office.
